exceptions.exn: In environment Y : Type HY : FiniteT Y Unable to unify "FiniteT (option ?M1673)" with "FiniteT (False + Y)".
In environment Y : Type HY : FiniteT Y Unable to unify "FiniteT Y" with "FiniteT (False + Y)".

original: intros X Y HX HY. induction HX. - apply add_finite. apply HY. - apply bij_finite with (f := fun x => Some x) (X := option T). + apply HY. + split. * intros [x|]; reflexivity. * intros [x|]; reflexivity.
